questions.question: What is the dominant color of the frying pan's body?
What material appears to constitute the frying pan's handle?
What is the apparent color of the handle attached to the pan?
Describe the texture of the pan's interior base, visible near the handle?
What is the overall shape of the cooking surface of the pan?
What seems to be the material of the pan's cooking surface?
Is there a noticeable ring or band separating the main body from the cooking surface?
What color is the ring or band visible on the pan's cooking surface?
What design element is present on the pan's interior base?
What appears to be the handle's connection method to the pan?
Does the handle seem to have an ergonomic design for comfortable grip?
Describe the visible finish of the pan's exterior surface?
How many visible rivets secure the handle to the pan body?
What is visible on the bottom of the cooking surface?
Does the handle appear to have any textural features for enhanced grip?
